alert.note: Alert for Catoosa; Dade; Walker (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 8:07PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Catoosa, northwestern Walker and northeastern Dade Counties through 830 PM EDT... At 807 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Wildwood, or 8 miles northeast of Trenton, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, pea sized hail and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Fort Oglethorpe, Rossville, Chickamauga, Lookout Mountain, Chattanooga Valley, Fairview, Boynton, Lakeview, Chattanooga Valley, Morganville, Hooker and Wildwood. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
